MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L8 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Nickleby Close and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:41 PM on 8th November 2020.
